BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISCOM_ID_CANCEL_TRN (STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER, STR_ID_TYPE, DT_ICARD_ISSUE_DATE, STR_ISSUING_AUTHORITY, DT_VALID_CANCEL_DATE, STR_REASON_FOR_CANCELATION, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISCOM_ID_ENTRY_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCOM_ID_CANCEL_TRN T SET DT_VALID_CANCEL_DATE=?, STR_REASON_FOR_CANCELATION =?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCOM_ID_CANCEL_TRN T SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCOM_ID_ENTRY_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=1 WHERE STR_ID_CARD_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
